Buy Bitcoin with Neosurf

The companies below let you buy bitcoin with a Neosurf prepaid card. Neosurf cards are generally used to pay online without giving out private information, like bank or credit card numbers.

Local Bitcoins Buy Bitcoin

Buy bitcoin from local dealers, online or in person. Private and quick. 1% fee.

Buy Bitcoin

Bitboat Buy Bitcoin

Buy bitcoin fast with cash in the UK, Spain, Italy, France, Belgium, Cyprus, and Romania.

Buy Bitcoin

Coinhouse Buy Bitcoin

Buy bitcoins with NeoSurf prepaid gift cards. High limits available.

Buy Bitcoin

The list below contains the same companies listed above, but with more information about fees, countries supported, and many more additional details.

Local Bitcoins Buy Bitcoin

Local Bitcoins connects you with local sellers who accept Neosurf prepaid cards for Bitcoin. It's best to meet the seller in person and make the transaction in order to reduce the risk of fraud. Only deal with Local Bitcoins sellers with good feedback and a history of sales. Local Bitcoins charges a flast 1% fee on all transactions.

Buy Bitcoin

Coinhouse Buy Bitcoin

Coinhouse will let you buy bitcoin with a Neosurf prepaid card. Neosurf cards can be purchased at over 70,000 locations across Europe. Coinhouse charges a 17% fee for all purchases made with a Neosurf card. Coinhouse is located in Paris, France and is operated by Ledger, a Bitcoin security company.

Buy Bitcoin

If you want to buy bitcoin with lower fees, try buying with a SEPA transfer. Or, check out more payment methods.
